languages.text:
Each time the Overseer should be affected by the Perils of the Warp, they affect a random enemy inside the area of the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven instead. If no enemies are present, the Perils of the Warp will affect the Overseer as usual.
The Overseer must be inside that area to make this effect active.

traits.locale_text:
Each time the Overseer should be affected by the Perils of the Warp, they affect a random enemy inside the area of the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}Relaying{/g} Psyber-Raven instead. If no enemies are present, the Perils of the Warp will affect the Overseer as usual.
The Overseer must be inside that area to make this effect active.

languages.text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.
languages.original_text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона вызвал {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, они действуют не на надзирателя, а на случайного врага в этой же области. Если в этой области врагов нет, то угрозы варпа действуют на надзирателя, как обычно.

traits.locale_text: If the Overseer is in the {g|f:3159a138a7ee4cc48f4c88ebd3399d96}relaying{/g} psyber-raven's area of effect, whenever they trigger the perils of the warp, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in the area, the perils of the warp affect the Overseer as usual.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyse {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} her tetiklediğinde öteboyut tehlikeleri, Gözetmen yerine o alandaki rastgele bir düşmanı etkiler. Alanda hiç düşman yoksa öteboyut tehlikeleri, her zamanki gibi Gözetmen'i etkiler.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyse öteboyut tehlikelerini her tetiklediğinde öteboyut tehlikeleri, Gözetmen yerine o alandaki rastgele bir düşmanı etkiler. Alanda hiç düşman yoksa öteboyut tehlikeleri, her zamanki gibi Gözetmen'i etkiler.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeyse öteboyut tehlikelerini her tetiklediğinde öteboyut tehlikeleri, Gözetmen yerine o alandaki rastgele bir düşmanı etkiler. Alanda hiç düşman yoksa öteboyut tehlikeleri, her zamanki gibi Gözetmen'i etkiler.

languages.text: Si el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} está a 4 casillas o menos de distancia del psicocuervo, cada vez que el supervisor provoque {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}, afectará a un enemigo aleatorio que esté dentro de esa zona en vez de al supervisor. Si no hay enemigos en esta zona, las fatalidades de la disformidad afectan al supervisor de la manera habitual.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: Si el supervisor está a 4 casillas o menos de distancia del psicocuervo, cada vez que el supervisor provoque fatalidades de la disformidad, afectará a un enemigo aleatorio que esté dentro de esa zona en vez de al supervisor. Si no hay enemigos en esta zona, las fatalidades de la disformidad afectan al supervisor de la manera habitual.

languages.text: 如果{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}与生化渡鸦之间的距离不超过4格，则每当监察官触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}时，该效果不再会影响监察官，而会影响距离4格内的随机一名敌人。如果此区域内没有任何敌人，则亚空间的威胁效果依然会作用于监察官。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: 如果监察官与生化渡鸦之间的距离不超过4格，则每当监察官触发亚空间的威胁时，该效果不再会影响监察官，而会影响距离4格内的随机一名敌人。如果此区域内没有任何敌人，则亚空间的威胁效果依然会作用于监察官。

languages.text: Befindet sich der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} innerhalb von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Rabe, betrifft jedes vom Aufseher ausgelöste "{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}" einen zufälligen Gegner in dem Bereich anstatt des Aufsehers selbst. Befinden sich keine Gegner in dem Bereich, betrifft "Gefahren des Warp" wie gewohnt den Aufseher.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: Befindet sich der Aufseher innerhalb von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Rabe, betrifft jedes vom Aufseher ausgelöste "Gefahren des Warp" einen zufälligen Gegner in dem Bereich anstatt des Aufsehers selbst. Befinden sich keine Gegner in dem Bereich, betrifft "Gefahren des Warp" wie gewohnt den Aufseher.

languages.text: Si le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, chaque fois qu'il déclenche {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}, au lieu d'affecter le surveillant, l'effet s'applique à un ennemi aléatoire dans ce même rayon. S'il n'y a aucun ennemi dans cette zone, l'effet s'applique au surveillant.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: Si le surveillant se trouve dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, chaque fois qu'il déclenche Périls du Warp, au lieu d'affecter le surveillant, l'effet s'applique à un ennemi aléatoire dans ce même rayon. S'il n'y a aucun ennemi dans cette zone, l'effet s'applique au surveillant.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}がサイバーレイヴンの半径4セル以内にいる場合、監督者が{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}を発生させると、監督者の代わりにそのエリア内にいるランダムな敵に影響する。このエリアに敵がいない場合、危険な歪みは通常通り監督者に影響する。
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: 監督者がサイバーレイヴンの半径4セル以内にいる場合、監督者が危険な歪みを発生させると、監督者の代わりにそのエリア内にいるランダムな敵に影響する。このエリアに敵がいない場合、危険な歪みは通常通り監督者に影響する。
監督者がサイバーレイヴンの半径4セル以内にいる場合、監督者が危険な歪みを発生させると、監督者の代わりにそのエリア内にいるランダムな敵に影響する。このエリアに敵がいない場合、危険な歪みは通常通り監督者に影響する。

languages.text: Если {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона вызвал {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, они действуют не на надзирателя, а на случайного врага в этой же области. Если в этой области врагов нет, то угрозы варпа действуют на надзирателя, как обычно.
languages.original_text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} is within 4 cells of the psyber-raven, whenever the Overseer triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, it affects a random enemy inside that area instead of the Overseer. If there are no enemies in this area, perils of the warp affects the Overseer as usual.

traits.locale_text: Если надзиратель в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона вызвал угрозы варпа, они действуют не на надзирателя, а на случайного врага в этой же области. Если в этой области врагов нет, то угрозы варпа действуют на надзирателя, как обычно.

Если надзиратель в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона вызвал угрозы варпа, они действуют не на надзирателя, а на случайного врага в этой же области. Если в этой области врагов нет, то угрозы варпа действуют на надзирателя, как обычно.
